properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, ADRIFT IN
17-41N 018-37W AT 281200Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC MADRID,
PHONE: 349 1755 9133, MRCC MAURITANIA,
PHONE: 222 2505 8981,
E-MAIL: MRCCNOUAKCHOTT@PECHES.GOV.MR OR
MRCC LAS PALMAS, PHONE: 349 2846 7955.
